channel.title: Comments on: Stance XR / Pro Comp Coilovers

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2012/09/stance-xr-pro-comp-coilovers/#comment-42894">Jo</a>.
Muy bueno. They remind me of my old Tein Flexes, the car undulates along the road very well and smoothly. Not too stiff, either.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jo.

Muy bueno. They remind me of my old Tein Flexes, the car undulates along the road very well and smoothly. Not too stiff, either.

item.title: By: Jo
item.dc:creator: Jo
item.description: how'd they feel on the road any good?
item.content:encoded: how’d they feel on the road any good?

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: I can't imagine daily-ing 14k/12k springs. >__< Good stuff though man!
item.content:encoded: I can’t imagine daily-ing 14k/12k springs. >__< Good stuff though man!
